metadata.products: CD5; CD4; CD2; CB5; CB4; CB2; CD6; CB6; VK2; VM2; VN2; VR2; VU2; VT2; VS2; VG2

body.body: Pannier frame mounting protective stickers are designed to wear during use. If the protective stickers become detached or wear, a replacement parts kit T2350183 has been made available.
Protective stickers are designed to protect the pannier frame and may show signs of wear during use.
Triumph motorcycles do not accept wear as a warranty item.
Prior to removal of the sticker(s) make a note of the position to enable accurate positioning of the replacement part.
The individual protective stickers are only supplied as a set and are not available as separate items.
When ordering replacement parts, refer to the EPC
When ordering replacement parts, refer to the EPC.
Please mark your copy of the Service Manual with this information.

Please mark your copy of the Service Manual with this information. For electronic service manuals, store this information in a readily accessible place and refer to it often. This information will be included in the next service manual update.
